original_text: Now I have woken up Cyrus to do for me things that are right. I will make all his paths easy to travel on. He will build again my city, and he will make my people free to return home. Nobody will have to pay him any money or give him a bribe to do that.’ That is what the Lord Almighty says. Now I have woken up Cyrus
korean_text: 내가 공의로 그를 일으킨지라 그의 모든 길을 곧게 하리니 그가 나의 성읍을 건축할 것이며 사로잡힌 내 백성을 값이나 갚음이 없이 놓으리라 만군의 여호와의 말이니라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Now I have woken up Cyrus
to do for me things that are right
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 옳은 일을 하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I will make all his paths easy to travel on
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 모든 길을 평탄하게 하리니

sentences.original_text: He will build again my city
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나의 성을 다시 건축할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he will make my people free to return home
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성을 놓아 자기 고토로 돌아오게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Nobody will have to pay him any money
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그에게 돈을 주지 않을 것이요

sentences.original_text: or give him a bribe to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 하기 위해 뇌물을 주지도 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord Almighty says
Now I have woken up Cyrus
